lead_paragraph: Increasingly, the Taliban rely on their front-line fighters not only to strike at the Afghan security forces, but also to record the moment and share it.

byline.contributor: Fahim Abed contributed reporting from Kabul.

headline.print_headline: Fire, Film, Then Tweet: The Taliban’s New Way of War
headline.main: Fire, Film, Tweet: The Taliban’s New Way of War

snippet: Increasingly, the Taliban rely on their front-line fighters not only to strike at the Afghan security forces, but also to record the moment and share it....
